title: ericsson-vtap-pc5gc

ericsson-vtap-pc5gc:vtap.description: Tapping real-time or near real-time packets to an external system in a specific format

profiles.description: Contains tapping profiles to be used by consumers

protocol.description: List of protocol streamed for this domain

stream-consumers.description: Contains consumers to receive vtap traces

address.description: Contains the IP address or DNS domain name of the consumer

tapping-profile.description: Specifies the tapping profile used by the consumer
